## LinterRuleContext interface

Context given to every [LinterRule](./core.linterrule.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LinterRuleContext 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [config](./core.linterrulecontext.config.md) | [LinterConfig](./core.linterconfig.md) | Loaded linter configuration |
|  [fix](./core.linterrulecontext.fix.md) | boolean | True if the rule must fix the discovered issues, false otherwise |
|  [pkg](./core.linterrulecontext.pkg.md) | [PkgInfo](./core.pkginfo.md) | package.json information |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [report(message)](./core.linterrulecontext.report.md) | Report a linting error |
